faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find the answers you need, or contact our support team.

q1.question: What types of projects is Morning AI suitable for?
q1.answer: Morning AI is suitable for web application development of all scales, from personal blogs to large enterprise applications can benefit from our design system and AI features.

q2.question: Does it support custom design?
q2.answer: Yes, our design system fully supports customization. You can adjust colors, fonts, spacing and other design tokens to create unique interfaces that match your brand identity.

q3.question: How is technical support provided?
q3.answer: We provide multi-level technical support: free users can use community forums, paid users enjoy email support, and enterprise customers have dedicated customer success managers.

q4.question: How is data security guaranteed?
q4.answer: We adopt industry-standard security measures, including SOC 2 Type II certification, end-to-end encryption, and regular security audits to ensure your data security.

q5.question: Can I try it for free?
q5.answer: Absolutely! We offer a permanent free plan, and you can also apply for a 14-day free trial of the professional plan without requiring credit card information.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: Morning AI values your privacy. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

informationCollection.title: Information Collection
informationCollection.content:
We collect information you voluntarily provide to us, including but not limited to: your name, email address, company information, and other registration details. We also automatically collect technical information when you use our services, such as IP address, browser type, operating system, and access times.

When you use our AI features, we collect your input content and usage patterns to improve service quality. All collected information is processed and protected in accordance with this policy.

informationUse.title: Information Use
informationUse.content:
We use collected information to provide, maintain, and improve our services. Specific uses include: processing your requests and transactions, providing customer support, sending service-related notifications, conducting security monitoring and preventing abuse.

We also use anonymized data for analysis to understand usage trends and improve product features. Your personal information will not be used for commercial purposes without your consent.

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing
informationSharing.content:
We do not sell, trade, or transfer your personal information to third parties. We only share your information in the following circumstances: with your explicit consent, to comply with legal requirements or court orders, to protect our rights and security, when working with trusted service providers (who must comply with strict confidentiality agreements).

All third-party service providers must meet our data protection standards and may only use your information to the extent necessary to provide services.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content:
We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information, including encrypted transmission, secure storage, access controls, and regular security audits. Our systems use multi-layer protection mechanisms to ensure data security during transmission and storage.

While we make every effort to protect your information, please note that internet transmission cannot guarantee 100% security. We recommend you also take appropriate precautions to protect your account security.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content:
We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to improve your user experience. These technologies help us remember your preferences, analyze website traffic and usage patterns.

You can control cookie usage through your browser settings, but please note this may affect the normal operation of certain features. Third-party analytics tools we use (such as Google Analytics) also use cookies to collect anonymous usage data.

userRights.title: User Rights
userRights.content:
You have the following rights regarding your personal information: Right of access - you can request to view information we hold about you; Right of rectification - you can request correction of inaccurate information; Right of erasure - in certain circumstances, you can request deletion of your personal information; Right to data portability - you can request your data in a structured format.

To exercise these rights, please contact us using the contact information provided at the end of this policy. We will respond to your requests within a reasonable timeframe.

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content:
Our services are not directed at children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we discover we have collected such information, we will delete it immediately.

If you are a parent or guardian and discover that your child has provided personal information to us, please contact us immediately and we will take appropriate measures to delete the relevant information.

policyChanges.title: Policy Changes
policyChanges.content:
We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Significant changes will be notified to you via email or website announcement. We recommend you regularly review this policy to stay informed of the latest information.

Continued use of our services indicates your acceptance of the updated policy. If you disagree with the changes, please stop using our services.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or need assistance, please contact us through the following methods:
contact.addressValue: 123 Tech Street, San Francisco, CA 94105, USA

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introduction: Welcome to Morning AI services. By using our services, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content:
By accessing or using Morning AI's services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

These terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and Morning AI. We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time, and modified terms will take effect upon posting on the website.

services.title: Service Description
services.content:
Morning AI provides artificial intelligence-based SaaS platform services, including but not limited to: AI-driven design tools, component libraries, development workflow optimization, and other features. We are committed to providing high-quality, reliable services.

Service content may be adjusted based on technological developments and market demands. We will make every effort to notify you of significant changes in advance, but reserve the right to modify or terminate specific features at any time.

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
userAccounts.content:
Using certain service features requires creating an account. You are responsible for maintaining the accuracy and security of your account information, including choosing strong passwords and updating them regularly. You must not share account credentials with others.

You are responsible for all activities conducted through your account. If you discover unauthorized use, please notify us immediately. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate the terms.

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.content:
You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes. Prohibited activities include but are not limited to: uploading malware or viruses, attempting unauthorized access, harassing other users, infringing intellectual property rights, engaging in fraudulent activities.

We reserve the right to monitor usage and take appropriate action (including service suspension) to prevent abuse. Violation of usage policies may result in account termination and legal consequences.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content:
Morning AI services and all their content, features, and technology are the property of Morning AI or its licensors, protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

You receive a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the services. You may not copy, modify, distribute, or create derivative works. Content you create through the services belongs to you, but you grant us the necessary license to provide services.

paymentTerms.title: Payment Terms
paymentTerms.content:
Fees for paid services will be charged according to your selected plan. All fees are denominated in USD unless otherwise specified. Subscription fees are charged monthly or annually in advance.

We accept credit cards and other specified payment methods. Failure to pay on time may result in service suspension. Refund policies are detailed in our refund terms, and certain fees may be non-refundable.

privacy.title: Privacy Protection
privacy.content:
Your privacy is important to us. Our privacy policy details how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. Using our services indicates your agreement to our privacy policy.

We are committed to protecting your data security and will only use your information to the extent necessary to provide services. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.content:
Services are provided 'as is' without any express or implied warranties. We do not guarantee that services will be uninterrupted, error-free, or completely secure. You use the services at your own risk.

We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use the services. This includes but is not limited to data loss, business interruption, or loss of profits.

limitationLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationLiability.content:
To the maximum extent permitted by law, Morning AI's total liability for any damages shall not exceed the total fees you paid to us in the 12 months preceding the occurrence of the damage.

This limitation of liability applies to all types of damages, whether based on contract, tort, or other legal theories. Some jurisdictions do not allow the exclusion or limitation of certain damages, so the above limitations may not apply to you.

termination.title: Service Termination
termination.content:
You may stop using our services and delete your account at any time. We also reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account for violation of terms, prolonged inactivity, or other reasonable reasons.

After termination, your right to use the services will immediately cease. We may retain certain information to comply with legal obligations or resolve disputes. Termination does not affect the rights and obligations of either party arising before termination.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content:
These terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of California, without regard to conflict of law principles. Any disputes should first be resolved through good faith negotiation.

If negotiation cannot resolve the dispute, both parties agree to submit the dispute to the jurisdiction of the courts in San Francisco County, California. You agree to waive any objections regarding inconvenient forum or lack of jurisdiction.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content:
We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Significant changes will be communicated to you via email or in-service notifications. Modified terms will take effect immediately upon posting.

Continued use of the services indicates your acceptance of the modified terms. If you disagree with the changes, you should stop using the services. We recommend regularly reviewing the terms to understand the latest changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through the following methods:
contact.addressValue: 123 Tech Street, San Francisco, CA 94105, USA

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find the answers you need, or contact our support team.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.description: Find the answers you need, or contact our support team for more assistance.

q1.question: What types of projects is Morning AI suitable for?
q1.answer: Morning AI is suitable for web application development of all scales, from personal blogs to large enterprise applications, all can benefit from our design system and AI features.

q2.question: Does it support custom design?
q2.answer: Yes, our design system fully supports customization. You can adjust colors, fonts, spacing and other design tokens to create a unique interface that matches your brand identity.

q3.question: Can I try it for free?
q3.answer: Absolutely! We offer a permanent free plan, and you can also apply for a 14-day free trial of the professional plan without requiring credit card information.

q1.question: What paid plans are available?
q1.answer: We offer three plans: Starter ($29/month), Professional ($99/month), and Enterprise (custom pricing) to meet the needs of users of different scales.

q2.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
q2.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. After cancellation, your account will be downgraded to the free plan at the end of the current billing cycle.

q3.question: Do you offer educational discounts?
q3.answer: We offer a 50% educational discount for students and educational institutions. Please contact our sales team for details.

q1.question: Which frameworks and tech stacks are supported?
q1.answer: We support mainstream frontend frameworks like React, Vue, Angular, as well as full-stack frameworks like Next.js and Nuxt.js.

q2.question: How to integrate into existing projects?
q2.answer: Through our CLI tools or npm packages, you can easily integrate Morning AI components into existing projects without refactoring existing code.

q3.question: Does it support TypeScript?
q3.answer: Yes, all our components provide complete TypeScript type definitions to ensure type safety and better development experience.

q1.question: How is technical support provided?
q1.answer: We provide multi-level technical support: free users can use community forums, paid users enjoy email support, and enterprise customers have dedicated customer success managers.

q2.question: What is the response time?
q2.answer: Free users get community support with typical 24-48 hour response; paid users get email support within 12 hours; enterprise customers enjoy 4-hour response SLA.

q3.question: How is data security ensured?
q3.answer: We adopt industry-standard security measures, including SOC 2 Type II certification, end-to-end encryption, and regular security audits to ensure your data security.

search.title: Didn't find what you're looking for?

contact.title: Still have questions?
contact.description: If you haven't found the answer you need, our support team is always here to help.
